head.title: Questionnaire Text Collections | RIDE

category.catDesc: Can the text collection be identified in terms similar to traditional bibliographic descriptions (title, responsible editors, institution, date(s) of publication, identifier/address)?
Are the contributors (editors, institutions, associates) of the project documented?
Is contact information given?
Is there a description of the aims and contents of the text collection?
What is the purpose of the text collection?
What is the text collection‚Äôs target audience?
How does the text collection classify itself (e.g. in its title or documentation)?
To which field(s) of research does the text collection contribute?
What is the subject of the text collection (in a few words)?
What era(s) do the texts belong to?
What languages are the texts in?
What kind of texts are in the collection?
What kind of information is published in addition to the texts?
Are the principles and decisions regarding the design of the text collection, its composition and the selection of texts documented?
What selection criteria have been chosen for the text collection?
How large is the text collection in number of texts/items?
How large is the text collection in number of tokens?
Does the text collection have identifiable sub-collections or components?
Does the text collection record or transcribe the textual data for the first time?
What kind of material has been taken over from other sources?
Has the quality of the data (transcriptions, metadata, annotations, etc.) been checked?
What kind of research does the collection allow to conduct primarily?
How does the text collection deal with the texts that it is built up of?

xf:submission.xf:message: VALIDATION ERROR: Please fill in all the fields. Missing fields:

body.p: Please fill in all the fields in all the tabs before submitting. Form data cannot be saved and forms cannot be edited at a later stage. Resubmission, though, is possible.
Mandatory fields. Furthermore, please make sure that you answer all questions in the questionnaire below.
Important information concerning individual questions is available via the info-symbol. Please read before answering a question.

xf:trigger.xf:message: Editors Bibliographical description of responsible personnel. Please indicate names as "forename surname".

xf:input.xf:label: URI:
xf:input.xf:message: URI Invalid URI. Format should be http://abc.de

xf:input.xf:label: Publication Date:
xf:input.xf:message: Publication Date Invalid Date. Format should be either yyyy, yyyyff. or yyyy-yyyy, e.g. 2007 or 2007-2013

xf:trigger.xf:message: Publication Date Format should be either yyyy, yyyyff. or yyyy-yyyy, e.g. 2007 or 2007-2013

xf:input.xf:label: Date of last access:
xf:input.xf:message: Date of last access Invalid Date. Format should be yyyy-mm-dd

xf:input.xf:label: Email:
xf:input.xf:message: Email Invalid Email. Format should be abc@def.gh

xf:group.xf:label: Contributors and personnel
xf:group.xf:group:
Personnel
Please indicate the involved personnel by name (forename surname) and their respective roles.
Choose 'Contributor' if no other role is applicable.
Add a new entry
Editor Editor
Encoder Encoder
Programmer Programmer
Advisor Advisor
Designer Designer
Contributor Contributor

xf:group.xf:label: Purpose
xf:group.span: Hold the Ctrl/CMD key to select multiple entries.

xf:group.xf:label: Audience
xf:group.span: Hold the Ctrl/CMD key to select multiple entries.

xf:group.xf:label: Self-classification
xf:group.span: Hold the Ctrl/CMD key to select multiple entries.

xf:group.xf:label: Field of research
xf:group.span: Hold the Ctrl/CMD key to select multiple entries.

xf:group.xf:label: Era

xf:trigger.xf:message: Era Classics: before 500 CE. Medieval: 501 CE until 1500 CE. Early Modern: 1501 CE until 1800 CE. Modern: 1801 CE until 1945. Contemporary 1945 until today.

xf:group.span: Hold the Ctrl/CMD key to select multiple entries.

xf:group.xf:label: Language
xf:group.span: Hold the Ctrl/CMD key to select multiple entries.

xf:group.xf:label: Types of text
xf:group.span: Hold the Ctrl/CMD key to select multiple entries.

xf:group.xf:label: Additional information
xf:group.span: Hold the Ctrl/CMD key to select multiple entries.

xf:group.xf:label: Selection
xf:group.span: Hold the Ctrl/CMD key to select multiple entries.

xf:group.xf:label: Text integration
xf:group.span: Hold the Ctrl/CMD key to select multiple entries.

xf:group.p: Before submitting, please make sure that you have filled out all the mandatory fields in the "Resource reviewed" and "Reviewer" sections, as well as all the fields in all the tabs.
When you press "Submit", it may take some seconds until the questionnaire has been sent.
